title: Macworld podcast: Apple’s greatest hits and misses of 2021
content: It’s been another big year for Apple. And on this episode of the Macworld Podcast, we talk about the Apple events and product announcements that left an impression on us. It’s our favorite Apple releases of 2021, coming up on the podcast! This is episode 772 with Jason Cross, Michael Simon, and Roman Loyola. Podcast sponsor Thinking of getting an iPhone […]
